评论详情: Likes: The fabric is super soft, isn't clingy, covers all my flaws well, seems to be very well made, and they are longer in the front than most of the stores in my area carry. When I grocery shop and have to grab an item from the top shelf the last thing I want to do is to flash my bare 61 year old belly to other shoppers. They are EXACTLY what I was hoping for- I bought 6 with the intent to buy more in other colors. The only issue I have, as others have commented. . . .it runs large. Very large.  I am 5'6" and 198lbs, and bought these shirts because they are cute, but they don't necessarily scream juniors or young adult. I am currently losing weight so I bought these as an inspiration  garment- I can't wear them until I lose weight and fit into them.  Wrong!! I fit into a medium, and the medium is on the large side of medium. ALL my current clothes are xl, so I thought medium would be about right. I think the future sizes I will purchase will be xs or small. I will decide that when I lose weight and see what I think, then.

This top is not super thick which is nice living in Texas. I can easily wear a loose coat over top if needed. I would not say material is soft nor is it itchy. Very cute with leggings. Can also be tucked in with jeans. I’m 5’7, 140lb.

评论概述: Okay. Color not as advertised but still fine.
评论详情: I like it. It's very soft but in the way stretchy athletic wear feels (synthetic). Yet I think it'll still be warm enough for indoors in poorly insulated old buildings during great lakes winters.  Cons: I know it's meant to be oversized, but it still feels a little too big, especially in the arms. It's a (very) dropped shoulder. I got the 2x based on my size chart and I'm usually a 2x/US size 20 and probably could've gotten an XL. I think if I tuck the band at the bottom into jeans it'll be more flattering. The colors are also off. I got the pink/blue/yellowish colorway. In the pictures, the sleeves look like a golden, slightly muted yellow. In reality they are darker and more of a tan or camel color. The pink is also a hotter pink that leans more. But in the pictures it looks like a softer pink that leans a little purple. The colors are still fun and work together but I was initially disappointed. It's growing on me.  All that said I like it, and I'll probably order another color way or the short sleeve version in a different color.

I bought this for a gift. It's cute and casual. You could dress it up alittle with shoes. The material is light and feels cool but not thin. Easy to wash and hang to dry. I would say it runs true to size. I got this on a good sale so definitely worth the price.

My husband got my this top. It is super soft & I liked the colors but it was very wide & short with baggy shoulders. Unfortunately it had to be returned. I am rather tall possibly if someone is shorter the short torso wouldn't be as bad.

I'm 6ft and around 200lbs, with a long torso. I got the XL in this and it's nicely large on me (and plenty long). It's soooo comfy, the inside is super soft. The stretch is great, the colors have been accurate according to the photos so far, and the waistband isn't too tight or loose. I also bought a L in another color and that also fit, a little bit tighter obviously, but comfy and flattering. I have bought three of these shirts...
Warm, comfortable and cozy sweater ! Beautiful color to wear ! Also, fit and right size!

I really liked this shirt. Very comfy and quality materials. I’m 5’8 and I like my shirts a bit longer.  This came just to the top of my butt. I like at least 1/2 way over the butt.  Nice shirt for shorter folks.

I really like this sweater. I'm a Medium & although it states this sweater runs large, I purchased a medium anyway. Although there's plenty of room in the shoulders, it fits very nicely. It's kind of a thin material but not see through & warm enough for FL weather in the 50s or 60s. Love this sweater- you will too.

Bought this for my teenage daughter for Christmas. She absolutely loves the softness of this sweater and we were slightly concerned that it wouldn't work for her because she has tactile issues... It was a hit. We will likely buy more in the different colors and probably a size down because she has a petite frame even though she likes the looseness.  I think it will still be to her satisfaction a size smaller. It is great quality too.

I liked this shirt.  No complaints.  I want to order more in different colors.  I accidentally ordered two that are very similar so I am exchanging one for a different color pattern.  There are oodles of patterns and colors and the two I ordered are different but very close in color.  I was just going to keep both but I liked the shirt so much I decided to exchange one of them for a different color.

I wasn’t expecting it to be this soft. The inside is ‘brushed’ and doesn’t feel like a ribbed fabric at all. The only detail I don’t love ve is the way it’s trimmed on the sleeves/under the arms. It would be perfect if it was just around the top/chest.
This is a cute top and fits well. It’s flattering without looking overly baggy. It’s soft but the material is cheaper feeling.

This is for my granddaughter and my daughter said to order this for her. It came all wrinkly and not very appealing looking. Not soft,but like I said it's for my granddaughter so we;ll see if she likes it.
Looks and fit great
From the picture I expected the fabric to be cozier I guess I was thinking more cotton like in my head. Didn’t quite fit like expected but I still like it.
The material is like butter. SO SOFT and comfy! gonna wait to see how it washes, but will probably buy another. Great value. Thin / not super warm but not see through.
I like it but feel it runs big.
Not as thick as an actual sweatshirt, but if you wear a turtleneck or long sleeve undershirt underneath, you’ll be fine.  I didn’t want something too heavy and this is great with jeans.

评论概述: Comfy and casual - tall girl approved
评论详情: The oversized style leaked the Sleeves and torso nice and long. It is great for casual wear and I get many compliments on the color. Very comfortable fabric.

This shirt is a very comfortable material. It is almost silky like. It runs a little big, but that’s how I like my crewnecks. The rib texture is very nice. The colors are so pretty together. Goes great with jeans.
Fits as expected, absolutely reeks of perfume. Got 2 colors, only one of them reeks.
Liked the colors, fabric weight thinner than I expected and much looser in fit.
I love this sweater. Great material, very comfortable and a great fit.
I liked the colors but the recommended size was too big. The item’s thickness could have been greater for winter events.
I get complements every time I wear this top. It’s not too heavy to wear all year long. It’s drapes nicely and is so comfy!

评论概述: Cute fall top that runs big.
评论详情: The shirt is comfortable and I'm happy with it for the price. I was able to get it on sale for $20.00 and I think that was a fair price. The shirt is not worth the regular price of $30.00. I hope it will last more then one season. I needed to exchange the meduim for a small and I have never ordered a small on any top.  I'm normally a large and occasionally a medium. So size down.
Nice material is comfortable and washes well.
Great for my cruise

This is my go T-shirt. I love it. You can dress it up or dress it down. I ordered a large and had to replace for a medium. I’m 5’3 155 lbs I carry most of my way in my bust upper body. This is a great shirt to hide your mama Pooch also.
Love this top! Super comfy!
Love this shirt. Can dress with up with a pair of slacks and boots, or everyday with a pair of jeans. Comfortable and material Is soft. True to size of my normal shirt size.

I'm new to ordering clothing on Amazon, so I'm not sure on sizing. Glad I didn't go with the "recommended" size. It says a M will fit me best. Looking at it, that just didn't look right, so I ordered a Small. Even the small is a little too big. Material is a lot thinner than it looked. Not a warm sweater. All in all, I like it. Just not what I was expecting.
I have 3 of these sweaters and I love them. There lightweight and don’t hug your body. They hold up well in the washer and dryer to. These fix true to size
Could have used a smaller size but I love it
Wrinkles from being folded didn't come out when washed. I'm hesitant to try a steam iron because of the ribbed fabric and type of material
Pretty colors, lightweight, but run very large.
Very soft and silkly feel with some bulk to keep you warm .
Great sweater. Fits a little big.
Comfortable and cute, I purchased two more colors. They also have a matching girls version I purchased for my young daughter!

The only reason I gave it four stars because it makes me look like I have no curves at all and makes me look very boxy. lol  Other than this I like how it fits. I got a medium for an over size look but I probably could have sized up again to get the look I was going for. So it must run small.  The sleeves are pretty short too if I lift my arms they go up my arm so size up one maybe twice. And I’m really short and petite. I’m 4”10  I want to order again in a different color but size up and see if I get a better outcome.
Good color and comfortable. A little larger than expected.

First off, I’m recently postpartum and having a hard time feeling good about my body. This sweater is amazing! I feel so good in it! It is comfortable and flattering! It runs a bit on the oversized side, which is exactly what I wanted. I really love this shirt.
Runs big, nice color
I didn't really care for the colors together when it came. I washed it and gave it to someone.

Beautiful color, just like pic. Not heavy, material is soft. Washed and dried great! Fits too big (my fault, I shy away from tight fits), but will keep to wear with leggings. Love it so much, ordering a medium in different color to compare sizes.
It is comfortable and looks really nice. I threw it onthe Dayi received it and have gotten many compliments. This top is stylish and feels so good on that I don’t want to take it off. Great value.
Love this shirt. Super comfy. Just a fyi, if you have small wrists you'll find the cuffs very large. I am an XL but my wrists are small.
Bought this for my mother in law and works great! A little short in the front but she doesn’t mind.
Shirt is well made and feels amazing. Fits extremely loose, if I buy another (which I plan to) going to try a size smaller.
The material is lighter than sweatshirt material, but it's warm and comfortable.

This material is my favorite this season. I wish I had ordered a large instead of medium but I’ll keep it the price is a little high for these style shirts. It’s made ok but nothing high end. I do like it. Color also not as bright or pretty as the pictures. That was a bummer. But do like the shirt
Comfortable but weird fit. Snug neck, sleeves are long, but the bottom is short and keeps riding up. Like the material though!

The fabric inside the shirt is soft and comfortable. The look of the shirt is exactly like the pictures and sizes are accurate. I am 5’4” and approximately 150 pounds and a medium fit perfect. For reference I like a little bit of a looser fit not a tight fit. The top is super cute and I would definitely buy again and other colors.
Very soft, a little big but very comfortable.
Size was right, color is great and it s warm …. Love it … would buy again
I really love this. Debated getting it for a while and finally did. Very happy with the comfort and fit. Not the first product I've bought from them and won't be the last.

I love the colors and the weight of this shirt. Not a sweater, not a sweatshirt- more of a heftier long sleeve tee with nice ribbed texture. My only complaint is the banding at the waist. Too tight to let the shirt hang naturally. In my opinion,  it cuts in too tight right at the hips in an unflattering way. I would give 5 stars if the band was different.
Looks good, feels great!
This top is comfortable, and looks effortlessly cute. It does run a little big, so if you’d like a tighter fit, I’d recommend ordering a size down. It’s stretchy, but not clingy.

This is exactly what I wanted! I sized down one from my normal size - usually Large but ordered a Medium and it fit perfectly. If you want a looser fit, order your regular size. Fabric is not heavy, just very comfortable.
Love the material ... it's not too heavy or too hot to wear.
Nice, comfortable and very stretchy

This shirt is so nice! I love everything about it. The color, the fit, the originality, the quality! BUT this seriously is the most amazing, soft and comfy shirt I own! The material feels like a cross between silk and the softest, most breathable cotton. I love it so much!!
Cute sweater. Definitely more lightweight but great for fall.
I really like the colors in this shirt and the material is wonderful good buy.

The material is thinner than I was expecting. It’s definitely not comparable to a sweater. The colors are nice, but they seem to be a little lighter in person.  I got an XL, but it seemed a little shorter than most XL shirts I have.

The quality of the shirt is amazing, I love it just like your short sleeve ones as I have many colors in the short sleeve style. So I thought I would try the long sleeve style, but it is way way too big. It was huge and I got the same size that I normally get in the short sleeve.
